title: Reactive Resume
description: A one-of-a-kind resume builder that keeps your privacy in mind. Completely secure, customizable, portable, open-source and free forever.

title: Madrasi Bride
description: A wedding blog/magazine focused on making the bride and groom's day as memorable as possible by sourcing the best of content.

title: Be Thrifty Today
description: Be Thrifty Today is a simple and secure money management app that helps you track your incomes and expenses.

title: All The Words That I Know
description: A simple game to test your vocabulary and your memory, with a little bit of fun. Let's see what are all the words that you know?

title: Mutual Fund Calculator
description: A mutual fund investment calculator which allows you to track your SIP and Lumpsum investments and using real historical NAV data from AMFI.
